name: Exercise 1 Game development
description: A fun little project using physics and unity for my first exercise in my game design class. Built a Rube Goldberg's machine and mainly experimented with ramps and bouncing mechanics with the spheres. Used a bridge but ended up not needing it much, but pretty fun to try and attempt it. Got most of the graphics online and used a pirate theme of sorts of a cannon ball being launched into a beach. Main purpose of project was to familiarize myself with the physics of the unity engine.
